summary: Vilknar is an imperial with a story.
descriptionHtml:
Background And Plot

After the thalmor banned talos worshipping the family of Vilknar 
got killed, vilknar was an imperial soldier that served the
thalmor for as long as they would not harm his family, but
the thalmors did not live up to their promise.
one night while vignar was out the thalmors broke into his
home and murderd Vilkanrs family, when vilknar came home he 
found a note on his sons chest saying 
\'\' Vilknar we could no longer let your family\'s talos
worshipping go unphunised so we had to stop them, you are to
report to the white gold tower tommorow\'\'

As vilknar read this hes heart got filled with rage, he swore
to avenge his family but this could not be done in cyrodiil.
So Vilknar set of to Skyrim with only one thing, a heart
filled with rage agenst the Empire!


After reading this i will not put any plot og goals for you,
you are to self understand them and do your choices, if you
were Vilknar what would you do?

Remember to play on Exper or Adept!
Turn of all displays! 

and if you se any Thalmors.. Kill them
author: Rayvales
